quest.name: I Felt Your Presents
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Thaymoth gazes wistfully into the distance, his thoughts malms away.
objectives: Deliver Thaymoth's letter to Ghin Gin.

dialogue.name: THAYMOTH
dialogue.text: That Ghin Gin worries about his son more than is healthy. For either of them. But perhaps I'm not so different. I had to leave my daughter behind in the Crystarium while I oversee trade with Mord Souq, and I've not been back for some time.

dialogue.name: THAYMOTH
dialogue.text: I'd like to send her a gift, to let her know we haven't forgotten about her. Only thing is, I've no idea what young women are interested in these days. I'd ask the others, but I don't want them to think I'm doting on her.

dialogue.name: THAYMOTH
dialogue.text: I was wondering if you could find out for me? Lorotte over there has a daughter about the same age as mine. I expect she'll know what would make for a decent present.

dialogue.name: THAYMOTH
dialogue.text: Of course, something that's not too big or expensive would be ideal.

dialogue.name: LOROTTE
dialogue.text: A gift for a young lady? Let me guess, Thaymoth sent you to ask me, didn't he?

dialogue.name: LOROTTE
dialogue.text: We all know how much he misses that girl of his. He tries to put on a brave face, but deep down, he's a big softie.

dialogue.name: LOROTTE
dialogue.text: Anyway, in answer to your question, the Mord make the most beautiful jewelry from precious stones and valuable relics excavated here in Amh Araeng.

dialogue.name: LOROTTE
dialogue.text: I'll bet you don't see many of those around the Crystarium. How about something like that?

dialogue.name: LOROTTE
dialogue.text: Come to think of it, I wouldn't mind something like that myself.

dialogue.name: THAYMOTH
dialogue.text: Mord jewelry? I'll admit, that never would've occurred to me, but it's a fine choice. From what I recall, Ghin Gin deals in wares like that.

dialogue.name: THAYMOTH
dialogue.text: If I write a letter to him, would you be so kind as to deliver it to Mord Souq? I'll leave the particulars to him, since I don't know the first thing about gems and whatnot.

dialogue.name: THAYMOTH
dialogue.text: Oh, and by the way, you don't suppose Lorotte cottoned on, do you?

dialogue.name: THAYMOTH
dialogue.text: Bloody hells, nothing gets past her! I might as well ask her myself next time, but I appreciate your help.

dialogue.name: THAYMOTH
dialogue.text: That Ghin Gin certainly is a strange one, but I daresay he knows a lot more about jewelry than I do. I'll leave the design and so on in his capable hands.

dialogue.name: GHINGIN
dialogue.text: Oh, welcome back! I take it everything went well with Thaymoth?

dialogue.name: GHINGIN
dialogue.text: A letter, hmm? <mumble> ...jewelry...daughter...Crystarium... <mumble> I see! Yes, I know just the thing!

dialogue.name: GHINGIN
dialogue.text: The scavengers have found some nice necklaces we can use. Old, but shiny! I'll have it ready in a jiffy, then my son can take care of the delivery.

dialogue.name: GHINGIN
dialogue.text: Before I forget, please accept this as payment for all of your hard work. You have certainly earned it!
